underlying_goal: Create a 2025 C-Level performance evaluation PPT based on monthly notes and weekly meeting minutes, referencing the previous year's PPT format
friction_detail: Claude could not properly edit the PPT table contents and instead produced a markdown summary file and only updated the evaluator name, rather than fully populating the PPT.
brief_summary: User wanted a 2025 performance evaluation PPT created from monthly notes and meeting minutes; Claude gathered the data and produced a markdown summary but only partially edited the actual PPT file.
